ModMetaData.name: 21st Century Armory
ModMetaData.author: Axinex
ModMetaData.description: 21st Century Armory is a mod focused upon presenting a lore-friendly, balanced approach to modern firearms on the Rim. Featuring a (ever-growing) host of 21st century firearms from around the world, ranging from assault rifles to pistols, shotguns to sniper rifles, and everything in-between, there's something here for everyone!
